  • Method Details

    • exceptionCoalesce

      @Deprecated(since="2021/03/03") public static <T> T exceptionCoalesce​(Callable<T> callable, T defaultValue)
      Deprecated.
      ExceptionSuppressor created to replace this method.
      Runs a block. If an exception occurs, return the default value. Else return the calculated value from the block. Deprecated; replace with an ExceptionSuppressor instance.
      Type Parameters:
      T - Return type
      Parameters:
      callable - Code block to execute
      defaultValue - Default value if an exception occurs
      Returns:
      Returned value from block or default value if an exception occurs

    • partialApply

      public static <T,​ U,​ R> Function<U,​R> partialApply​(BiFunction<? super T,​? super U,​? extends R> function, T arg)
      Partially apply a two-argument function onto a single argument. Transforms the function into a function that takes one argument of the type of the old function's second argument.
      Type Parameters:
      T - First argument type
      U - Second argument type
      R - Return type
      Parameters:
      function - Function to partially apply
      arg - Argument to apply the function to
      Returns:
      Partially applied function.

    • partialApply

      public static <T,​ R> Supplier<R> partialApply​(Function<? super T,​? extends R> function, T arg)
      Fully apply a single-argument function onto an argument. Transforms the function into an Supplier for the value it would return if it was applied normally.
      Type Parameters:
      T - Argument type
      R - Return type
      Parameters:
      function - Function to apply
      arg - Argument to apply the function to
      Returns:
      Supplier for result of applying function to arg.

    • curry

      public static <T,​ U,​ R> Function<T,​Function<U,​R>> curry​(BiFunction<? super T,​? super U,​? extends R> function)
      Curry the BiFunction, turning the two-argument function into a single-argument function that when, supplied with an argument, returns another function which takes a second argument in order to get the desired result.
      Type Parameters:
      T - Type of first argument
      U - Type of second argument
      R - Return type
      Parameters:
      function - Function to curry
      Returns:
      Function representing the curried function.

      Type Parameters:

      R - Return type
      Parameters:
      function - Curried function to uncurry
      Returns:
